project.title: Project Name. Tip: Keep it short, e.g. "NIST RTC"
project.description: Brief description (1-2 sentences). E.g. "The Robotic Training Center (RTC) creates machine learning models for insertion tasks."
project.members: Andrew ID(s) (seperated by comma). E.g. "shobhita, ssterenr, klz1"
project.organization: Organization(s) (seperated by comma), e.g. "CMU, ARM" or "SCS, RI, ME"
